manzils.text: 26|1|tva-sin-mim
26|2|suvyaktamaya granthattile vacanannalaniva
26|3|avar visvasikalakattatinre perilni ninre jivan nasippiccekkam
26|4|ennal ‍nam uddesikkunna paksam avarute mel akasatt ninn nam oru drstantam irakkikeatukkunnatan anneram avarute piratikal atinn kileatunnunnatayittirukayum ceyyum
26|5|paramakarunikanre pakkal ‍ninn etearu putiya ulbeadhanam vannettumpealum avar atilninn tirinnukalayunnavarakatirunnittilla
26|6|annane avar nisedhiccu talliyirikkayan atinal avar eteannine parihasikkunnavarayirikkunnuvea atinepparriyulla vrttantannal avarkk vannettikkeallum
26|7|bhumiyilekk avar neakkiyille? ella mikacca sasyavargannalilninnum etrayan nam atil ‍mulappiccirikkunnat‌
26|8|tirccayayum atiloru drstantamunt ennal avaril ‍adhikaperum visvasikalayilla
26|9|tirccayayum ninre raksitav tanneyakunnu pratapiyum karunanidhiyum
26|10|ninre raksitav musaye viliccu keant iprakaram paranna sandarbham (srad'dheyamatre,) ni a akramikalaya janannalute atuttekk celluka
26|11|atayat‌, phir'aunre janatayute atukkalekk avar suksmata palikkunnille? (ennu ceadikkuka)
26|12|addeham parannu: enre raksitave, avar enne nisedhiccu tallumenn tirccayayum nan bhayappetunnu
26|13|enre hrdayam nerunnippeakum enre navin olukkuntavukayilla atinal ‍harunn kuti ni sandesam ayakkename
26|14|avarkk enre peril oru kurram areapikkanumunt atinal avar enne keannekkumenn nan bhayappetunnu
26|15|allahu parannu: orikkalumilla, nam'mute drstantannalum keant ninnal iruvarum peayikkealluka tirccayayum ninnaleateappam nam srad'dhiccu kelkkunnunt‌
26|16|ennitt ninnal phir'aunre atukkalcenn iprakaram parayuka: tirccayayum nannal leakaraksitavinkalninn niyeagikkappetta dutanmarakunnu
26|17|israyil ‍santatikale nannaleateappam ayaccutaranam enna nirdesavumayitt‌
26|18|avan (phir'aun) parannu: kuttiyayirunnappeal nannalute kuttattil ‍ninne nannal valarttiyille? ninre ayus'sil ‍kure keallannal nannalute itayil ‍ni kaliccukuttiyittumunt‌
26|19|ni ceyta ninre a(dus‌) pravrtti ni ceyyukayumuntayi. ni nandikettavarute kuttattiltanneyakunnu
26|20|addeham (musa) parannu: nan ann at ceyyukayuntayi ennal ‍nan pilav parriyavarute kuttattilayirunnu
26|21|annane ninnalepparri bhayam teanniyappeal nan ninnalilninn otippeayi anantaram enre raksitav enikk tatvajnanam nalkukayum, avan enne dutanmaril oralakkukayum ceytu
26|22|enikk ni ceytu tannatayi ni etuttuparayunna a anugraham israyilsantatikale ni atimakalakki veccatinal untayatatre
26|23|phir'aun parannu: entan i leakaraksitav enn parayunnat‌
26|24|addeham (musa) parannu: akasannaluteyum bhumiyuteyum avaykkitayilullatinreyum raksitavakunnu ninnal drdha visvasamullavaranenkil
26|25|avan (phir'aun) tanre currumullavareat parannu: enta ninnal srad'dhiccu kelkkunnille
26|26|addeham (musa) parannu: ninnalute raksitavum ninnalute purvva pitakkalute raksitavumatre (avan)
26|27|avan (phir'aun) parannu: ninnalute atuttekk niyeagikkappetta ninnalute i dutanuntallea tirccayayum avan oru bhrantan tanneyan‌
26|28|addeham (musa) parannu: udayasthanattinreyum astamayasthanattinreyum avaykkitayilullatinreyum raksitavatre (avan) ninnal cinticcu manas'silakkunnavaranenkil
26|29|avan (phir'aun) parannu: nanallatta valla daivatteyum ni svikarikkukayanenkil ‍tirccayayum ninne nan tatavukarute kuttattilakkunnatan‌
26|30|addeham (musa) parannu: spastamaya entenkilum telivu nan ninakk keantu vannu kaniccalum (ni sam'matikkukayille)
26|31|avan (phir'aun) parannu: ennal ‍ni at keant varika ni satyavanmarilpettavananenkil

26|33|addeham tanre kai purattekketukkukayum ceytu appealata at kanikalkk vellaniramakunnu
26|34|tanre currumulla pramukhanmareat avan (phir'aun) parannu: tirccayayum ivan vivaramulla oru jalavidyakkaran tanneyan‌
26|35|tanre jalavidyakeant ninnalute nattilninn ninnale purattakkan avan uddesikkunnu atinal ‍ninnal ent nirdesikkunnu
26|36|avar parannu: avannum avanre saheadarannum tankal savakasam nalkuka alukale viliccukuttan nagarannalilekk tankal dutanmare niyeagikkukayum ceyyuka
26|37|ella vivaramulla jalavidyakkareyum avar tankalute atutt keantu varatte
26|38|annane ariyappetta oru divasam niscitamaya oru samayatt jalavidyakkar orumiccukuttappettu
26|39|janannaleat ceadikkappettu: ninnal sam'melikkunnuntallea
26|40|jalavidyakkaran vijayikalakunnatenkil ‍namukkavare pintutaramallea
26|41|annane jalavidyakkar vannettiyappeal phir'auneat avar ceadiccu: nannalan vijayikalakunnatenkil ‍tirccayayum nannalkk pratiphalamuntayirikkumea
26|42|avan (phir'aun) parannu: ate, tirccayayum ninnal samipyam nalkappetunnavarute kuttattilayirikkum
26|43|musa avareat parannu: ninnalkk itanullatellam ninnal ittukealluka
26|44|appeal tannalute kayarukalum vatikalum avar ittu avar parayukayum ceytu: phir'aunre pratapam tanneyana satyam! tirccayayum nannal tanneyayirikkum vijayikal
26|45|anantaram musa tanre vati taleyittu appealata at avar vyajamayi nirmiccirunnatineyellam vilunnikkalayunnu
26|46|appeal jalavidyakkar sastangattilayi vinu
26|47|avar parannu: leakaraksitavil ‍nannal visvasiccirikkunnu
26|48|atayat musayuteyum harunreyum raksitavil

26|49|avan (phir'aun) parannu: nan ninnalkk anuvadam tarunnatin mumpayi ninnal avanil ‍visvasiccuvennea? tirccayayum ivan ninnalkk jalavidya pathippicca ninnalute talavan tanneyan valiye ninnal arinnu keallum tirccayayum ninnalute kaikalum, ninnalute kalukalum etir ‍vasannalilninnayikkeant nan muriccu kalayukayum, ninnale muluvan nan krusikkukayum ceyyunnatan‌
26|50|avar parannu: kulappamilla tirccayayum nannal nannalute raksitavinkalekk matannippeakunnavarakunnu
26|51|nannal adyamayi visvasiccavarayatinal ‍nannalute terrukal nannalute raksitav nannalkk pearuttutarumenn nannal asikkunnu
26|52|musaykk nam beadhanam nalki: enre dasanmareyum keant ratriyil ‍ni purappettukealluka tirccayayum (satrukkal) ninnale pintutaran peakukayan‌
26|53|appeal phir'aun alukale viliccukuttan pattanannalilekk dutanmare ayaccu
26|54|tirccayayum ivar kuracc per matramulla oru sanghamakunnu
26|55|tirccayayum avar nam'me arisam keallikkunnavarakunnu
26|56|tirccayayum nam sanghatitarum jagarukarumakunnu (enninnane viliccuparayanan phir'aun nirdesiccat‌)
26|57|annane teattannalilninnum niruravakalilninnum nam avare purattirakki
26|58|bhandarannalilninnum man'yamaya vasasthalannalilninnum
26|59|aprakaramatre (nam'mute natapati) ateakke israyil ‍santatikalkk nam avakasappetuttikeatukkukayum ceytu
26|60|ennitt avar (phir'aunum sanghavum) udayavelayil avarute (israyilyarute) pinnale cennu
26|61|annane rant sanghavum parasparam kantappeal musayute anucaranmar parannu: tirccayayum nam pitiyilakappetan peakukayan‌

26|65|musayeyum addehatteateappamullavareyum muluvan nam raksappetutti
